meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by an earthquake or other geological seismic activity.
meanings.sent1: The seismically active region experienced frequent tremors.
meanings.sent2: The seismically unstable area required special building codes.
meanings.sent3: The seismically sensitive cat hid under the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The seismically shifting landscape altered the course of the river.
meanings.sent5: The seismically active volcano rumbled ominously in the distance.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to seismic activity or earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: The ground shook seismically during the earthquake.
meanings.sent2: The building swayed seismically as the tremors continued.
meanings.sent3: She danced seismically to the rhythm of the music, causing laughter among her friends.
meanings.sent4: The news of the impending storm hit him seismically, making him rush to prepare.
meanings.sent5: The thunder roared seismically, shaking the windows in their frames.
